means: 旱金莲属植物，旱金莲花

sentence.Network_en: The little dressmaker bought an envelope of nasturtium seeds at the florists.
sentence.Network_cn: 那个个子矮小的女裁缝在花铺里买了一包金莲花种子.

sentence.Network_en: I wouldn't know a nasturtium if I saw one.
sentence.Network_cn: 即使我看到了一株旱金莲也不认得.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 旱金莲 (Nasturtium) 花之语 : 爱国心花寓意 : 您是个独立冷静的人，思想成熟，从不倚赖他人。乍看之下，别人误以为您是个极难相 …

derivation.yuyuan_name: Old English, from Latin, apparently from naris 'nose' + torquere 'to twist'

entry.def: Nasturtiums are low plants with large round leaves and orange, red, and yellow flowers.

means.word_mean: 1. any tropical American plant of the genus Tropaeolum having pungent juice and long-spurred yellow to red flowers
2. flowers and seeds and leaves all used as flavorings
